California Institute of Technology: The California Institute of Technology (branded as Caltech)[9] is a private research university in Pasadena, California. The university is responsible for many modern scientific advancements and is among a small group of institutes of technology in the United States which are strongly devoted to the instruction of pure and applied sciences.[10][11] Due to its history of technological innovation, Caltech has been considered to be one of the world's most prestigious universities.[a]
